exceptions.tactic: apply is_lim_ext_loc with (f := f) (g := g) (x := x) (l := l).
exceptions.exn: The reference g was not found in the current environment.

In environment f : R -> R a, b : R x : Rbar H : ex_lim f (Rbar_plus (Rbar_mult a x) b) Eq : a <> 0 Unable to unify "ex_lim f (Rbar_plus (Rbar_mult a x) b)" with "Lim (fun y : R => f (a * y + b)) x = Lim f (Rbar_plus (Rbar_mult a x) b)".

original: intros H Eq. apply is_lim_ext_loc with (f := f) (g := g) (x := x) (l := l). - unfold Rbar_locally'. intros y. apply H. - auto.
